SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT m.MAC_CODE , MAC_NAME , MAC_DIV , MAC_SIZE , Worker , MODEL , PRO_OPER , USE , NOM_CAP , USING_ENERGY , SAFETY , MAC_PRO_DATE , to_char(BUY_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as buy_date , BUY_PRICE , LINE_NUM , MAC_LOADAGE , MAC_STD_TEMP , prc_code , (select prc_name from process where p.prc_code = prc_code) prc_name FROM MACHINE m ,machine_process p where m.mac_code = p.mac_code ORDER BY MAC_CODE DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )
